mendel.dht.hash

Interface HashRing<T>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BalancedHashRing

    public interface HashRing<T>
    Provides a generic interface for representing a hash space. Here we use the "ring" metaphor that is commonly employed in DHT topologies.
    Author:
    malensek

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.math.BigInteger addNode(T data)
      Add a node to the overlay network topology.
      java.math.BigInteger locate(T data)
      Determine the node that is responsible for the given data.

    • Method Detail

      • addNode

        java.math.BigInteger addNode(T data)
                             throws HashException,
                                    HashTopologyException
        Add a node to the overlay network topology.
        Parameters:
        data - key for the node being added
        Returns:
        the location of the new node in the hash space.
        Throws:
        HashException

      • locate

        java.math.BigInteger locate(T data)
                            throws HashException
        Determine the node that is responsible for the given data.
        Parameters:
        data - the data to hash against
        Returns:
        identifier of the node responsible for the provided data.
        Throws:
        HashException
